body:
Hello. Since everybody has been making AMAs i decided ill make one as well, and to get better with the community.
So an introduction in case you don't know me:
My name is Eric. I am from Israel and i am 13 years old. I joined this network 2 and half years ago and surprisingly this is the only thing ive been doing for such a long time without abandoning it. I still enjoy the gameplay even though its laggy, i got used to it. Im in the team Apollo which i consider as my second family :)
I have found many amazing people on this betwork however unfortunately some of them left, but those who are still here, im thankful for being your friend and meeting you. 
I have gotten into the staff team 1 month ago and i am currently in my Junior Mod trial. I consider myself as a person that doesnt like to follow others. I always try new stuff and i like to think creative. I always will express my opinion if its appropriate and even if its against all others opinions and yeah xd.
Since i am new to the stuff team i am open for any kind of feedback. I am online usually more than 4 hours a day unless i have important exams. I am always on TS and rarely use skype, but these are the 2 best ways to approach me.

Sorry for long introduction, and this is an AMA post, means i will answer any question you ask.

Edit: typed from phone so probably have tons of grammar mistakes.
